cards.name: M Mewtwo-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon times the amount of Energy attached to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Bone Revenge
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

cards.name: Marowak BREAK
text: Marowak BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.

ability.name: Premonition
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

attacks.name: Sensitive Blade
attacks.text: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Payback
attacks.text: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wish
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Call for Pals
attacks.text: Search your deck for as many Starly as you like and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Cyclone Slash
attacks.text: Before doing damage, have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Dual Cut
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Judge
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 4 cards.

attacks.name: Photon Wave
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Mewtwo-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Vanishing Strike
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 50 more damage, and this attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance or any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: M Mewtwo-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Photon Wave
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
